General.Name: Elite Naturel Organik Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Elite Naturel Organik Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the production and sale of vegetables and fruit juices in Turkey. It offers juices, pulp, concentrates, semi-finished, and unfinished forms of all kinds of organic fruits and vegetables, as well as other food stuffs. The company also provides various carbonated, non-carbonated, and non-alcoholic beverages. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.

2.Name: Mr. Rahmi  Ceyhan
2.Title: Exec. VP of Financial Affairs & Director
